div.p: This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in http://cts.nlm.nih.gov/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.837
Import all the codes that are contained in http://cts.nlm.nih.gov/fhir/ValueSet/2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1021.102

description.value: The codes for the concepts 'Unknown', 'Asked but no answer', and the ethnicity categories - 'Hispanic or Latino' and 'Non Hispanic or Latino' - as defined by the [OMB Standards for Maintaining, Collecting, and Presenting Federal Data on Race and Ethnicity, Statistical Policy Directive No. 15, as revised, October 30, 1997](https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/FR-1997-10-30/pdf/97-28653.pdf).
